name: KipRun
description:
It's year 3001. The world has been taken over by the Void Empire, and all humans are technologically enhanced.

Kipman was a normal citizen, until the events of 2976's worldwide reorganization process changed his life forever.

He was one of the many people captured for the biotechnological experiments. Many of them didn't go as expected, causing plenty of mutations in the test subjects.

Given the success of the Worldwide reorganization process, the empire took over and most test subjects were erradicated after said tests were over.

However, some of them were preserved for future research, Kipman was one of them.
25 years have passed, and despite he's being held captive in an ADX Prison, he has found the perfect opportunity for a jailbreak, due to a system failure.

Full version coming out in april 2020.

Also available on GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/kiprun/467462
